title: Email/Password Login Success
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using valid email and password credentials and access protected routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click the login button
User is authenticated and redirected to the marketplace or user dashboard
Access to protected routes is granted

title: Google OAuth Login Success
description: Verify users can log in using Google OAuth and access appropriate protected and admin routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click the 'Sign in with Google' button
User is authenticated via Google OAuth
User is redirected to the marketplace or dashboard
Protected and admin routes permission is enforced correctly

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the login fails with invalid email or password and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email or password
Click the login button
Login is rejected
Error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed

title: Marketplace Browsing with Filters and Search
description: Verify users can browse the marketplace with filters and search, returning correct paginated and cached results.

steps.description: Navigate to the marketplace page
Apply various filters (e.g., category, price) and use the search bar
Marketplace results update according to filters and search query
Pagination controls are working correctly
Navigate away and return to marketplace
Marketplace listings load instantly from cache due to prefetching

title: Marketplace Item Detail View and Prefetch
description: Verify clicking on a marketplace item loads detailed view and prefetching works for fast navigation.

steps.description: Navigate to a marketplace item from the list
Detailed information about the website or AI agent is displayed
Hover or interact with other marketplace items
Prefetching of item details and marketplace data occurs in the background
Click on prefetched items
Content loads instantly without delay

title: Purchase Flow for Marketplace Items
description: Verify users can initiate and complete purchases of websites and AI agents, and purchase history updates.

steps.description: Navigate to an item detail page in the marketplace
Click the purchase button
Complete the checkout process (simulate payment flow)
Purchase success confirmation is shown
Navigate to user profile purchase history tab
New purchase is reflected accurately in purchase history

title: Admin Panel - CRUD Operations on Websites and AI Agents
description: Verify admin users can create, read, update, and delete website and AI agent entries with immediate UI update and validation.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user and navigate to the admin panel
Create a new website or AI agent listing with valid data
New listing appears immediately in the grid
Edit the newly created listing with updated values
Updates reflect immediately with correct data validation
Delete the listing
Listing is removed immediately from the UI

title: Admin Panel - User Reviews Moderation and Metrics
description: Admin users can moderate user reviews and view metrics with real-time updates.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open the Pending Reviews tab
Approve and reject user reviews
Reviews status updates immediately reflect in the UI
Navigate to admin metrics dashboard
Metrics for websites, AI agents, and user engagement are displayed correctly

title: User Profile Management and Persistence
description: Verify users can view and edit profile info, stats, and purchase history with persisted updates.

steps.description: Login as a user and navigate to Profile page
User's current profile info, stats, and purchase history are correctly displayed
Edit profile details (e.g., name, email, preferences) and save changes
Profile updates are saved and reflected immediately
Reload the Profile page
Saved changes persist after reload

title: AI Chat Assistant - Message Handling and Quick Actions
description: Verify chat assistant can send and receive messages, display them properly, and handle quick action triggers.

steps.description: Open AI chat assistant sidebar
Send a message to the AI chat assistant
Message appears in the chat window
Receive AI response message
AI response is displayed correctly and timely
Trigger a quick action from suggested options
Quick action executes expected behavior

title: Blog Listing and Reading Posts
description: Verify users can navigate blog post listings and read detailed posts.

steps.description: Navigate to the blog listing page
List of blog posts is displayed with titles and excerpts
Click on a blog post
Blog post detail content is rendered correctly

title: Project Calculator Estimations
description: Users can input project parameters and receive estimated cost and features output.

steps.description: Navigate to the project calculator page
Input various project parameters (e.g., features, scale)
Submit the form to get estimation
Estimated project cost and feature breakdown are displayed accurately

title: Contact Form Validation and Submission Tracking
description: Verify contact form validates inputs, triggers analytics events on submission, and shows confirmation.

steps.description: Attempt to submit contact form with invalid or missing inputs
Validation errors are displayed preventing submission
Submit contact form with valid input data
Form submits successfully and user is navigated to confirmation page
Analytics event for form submission is sent

title: SEO Component Render Verification
description: Verify SEO components render correct structured data, meta tags, FAQ schema, and geo-schema on respective pages.

steps.description: Navigate to a page with SEO structured data (e.g., marketplace or blog post)
Structured data and meta tags in the page head include accurate information
Navigate to a page with FAQ schema
FAQ Schema JSON-LD is present and valid
Navigate to pages with GEO structured data
Geo-schema JSON-LD is present and conforms to standards

title: Performance Optimizations - Cache and Prefetching
description: Verify caching layers at HTTP, service worker, and React Query enable fast load times and prefetching for marketplace pages.

steps.description: Load marketplace page for the first time
Content loads within defined performance thresholds
Navigate away and back to the marketplace page
Marketplace content loads instantly from cache
Trigger prefetching by hovering marketplace items
Prefetching completes successfully without blocking UI

title: Google Analytics 4 Event Tracking
description: Verify Google Analytics 4 properly tracks page views, button clicks, and form submissions.

steps.description: Navigate to multiple pages in the application
Page view events are recorded in GA4
Click purchase buttons and submit contact forms
Button click and form submission events are recorded in GA4

title: Theme Switching and Persistence
description: Verify users can toggle dark/light modes with immediate UI update and that preference is persisted across sessions.

steps.description: Locate theme toggle switch in UI
Switch from light to dark mode
UI updates immediately to dark mode without page reload
Reload the application
Dark mode persists after reload
Switch back to light mode and verify persistence

title: Responsive Layout Components Functionality
description: Verify header, footer, sidebar, and navigation components render and behave correctly on desktop and mobile views.

steps.description: Access the platform using desktop viewport
Header, footer, sidebar, and navigation display correctly and are functional
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions or simulate mobile device
Layout components switch to mobile versions (mobile bottom nav, drawer) and are functional
Test navigation interactions on mobile
Navigation items open and clickable, sidebar toggles correctly

title: Live Support Chat - Admin and User Interactions
description: Verify live support chat functionality for both users and admin, including message send/receive and session persistence.

steps.description: User starts live support chat session
Send message from user side
Message appears in user chat window immediately
Admin receives message in live support tab
Admin replies to the message
User receives admin reply in real-time
Simulate network interruption and recovery
Chat session persists or reconnects smoothly without data loss

title: Contact Form Submission Error Handling
description: Verify contact form displays validation errors for various invalid inputs and prevents submission.

steps.description: Navigate to contact form page
Leave required fields empty and attempt to submit
Validation errors for required fields are displayed
Enter invalid email format and attempt to submit
Email validation error is displayed
Correct inputs and submit successfully
Form submission succeeds after corrections

title: SEO Meta Tags and Structured Data Verification via Page Source
description: Verify that SEO meta tags and JSON-LD data for structured content are correctly embedded in page source.

steps.description: Navigate to key pages (e.g., Marketplace, Blog post, FAQ)
View page source and confirm presence of SEO meta tags and JSON-LD structured data
Meta tags contain correct and relevant information per page context
